title: The Empire strikes back (Captioned)
brief_description: The battle to save the galaxy from the evil Darth Vader rages on in this spellbinding Star Wars sequel. In a spectacular opening battle the Rebels suffer a devastating attack by an Imperial Army using ATAT walkers. Hans Solo, Princess Leia and Chewbacca survive, and fight a running space battle against Imperial ships while Luke Skywalker seeks out Yoda, the ancient Jedi Master, to be trained as a true Jedi Knight. Rated: PG Caption Version only Available.
